items.title: 1.1 Foundations of Physical AI
items.description: Deep dive into the core principles of Physical AI and how intelligence differs when operating in physical systems.

items.title: 1.3 ROS2 Core Concepts and Implementation
items.description: Deep dive into ROS2 core concepts with practical implementation details for Physical AI systems.

items.title: 1.4 Embodied Cognition in Physical AI
items.description: Explore the principles of embodied cognition and how physical form influences intelligent behavior in robotics.

items.title: 1.5 Environmental Interaction in Physical AI
items.description: Explore how Physical AI systems interact with and adapt to their environments.

items.title: Module 1 Capstone Project: Physical AI System Integration
items.description: Integrate all Module 1 concepts into a comprehensive Physical AI system demonstrating embodied cognition and environmental interaction.
